pubg.description: Event Duration: 2 Hours. Event to be held on All the Days (Morning Session)
pubg.rules:
Requirements:
  • Room Cards(PUBG), Benches, Chairs 
  • Rules:
    • Teams will be judged on their no. of kills as well as  their ranks(50% consideration of each) 
    • Core Team can participate too!
